name: JSON Binding Data Object
summary: Learn about .BDOJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: BDOJ files are a variant of typical .BDO files (which are .XML based). The NSO defined both the BDOJ and BDO formats in sections of Allied Data Publication 4778. Just like BDO files, BDOJ files may be digitally signed, allowing others to verify their authenticity.

description: A BDOJ file is a JSON-based Binding Data Object, saved in a format defined by the NATO Standardization Office (NSO). BDOJ files are used to associate (or bind) metadata with a data object. This binding may be either a detached or encapsulated binding.

instructions: Because BDOJ files are just renamed .JSON files, you can open them with Microsoft Visual Studio Code or any other text editor. Doing so will allow you to view and edit the information the files contain.
